person.persName: James Henry Hargis (Coal miner; Private and company clerk (Co. C) in the 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, coal miner and solider. Pike County, Kentucky, native. Married to Amanda Hargis. Father of Kenaz F. Hargis and Hebalice Hargis. Private and company clerk in the 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from March 1865 to September 1865.
